name: keyhole.chat
description: A web-chat server using Chrome's Speech Recognition, Speech Synthesis, User Media, and Socket.io

scripts.build-dev: npm run render-lodash && npm run render-css-dev  && npm run render-js-dev  && npm run render-html-dev
scripts.rebuild-dev: npm run render-css-dev  && npm run render-js-dev  && npm run render-html-dev
scripts.build-compact: npm run render-lodash && npm run render-css-compact && npm run render-js-compact  && npm run render-html-compact

author: Zachary Skalko
